name: Loop
description:
[Synopsis]

One day, all of a sudden,
Sora finds out that the elevator is connected to her room on her usual way to work.
She tries to find a way to escape this endless Loop. Your choices will be a matter





[How to Play]

At the moment of decision, two options are given. You have to make a decision in 10 seconds.
You can skip the video using the arrow keys.



[Game features]



You can see the progress of the game on the flow chart menu. select a turning point, and change your decision





You can check out the ending list. Find the ending and collect the pictures.


Find Your Escape
your choices will always have consequences
.
